page.title: 05ENTERTAINMENT IN LONGNEWTON
page.content: EVERY YEAR ON THE PLAYING FIELD AT THE BOTTOM OF THE VILLAGE THERE IS{THE {VILLAGE SHOW}.THERE IS A FANCY DRESS COMPETITION AND WHOEVER WINS GETS A CUP.THERE IS ALSO A{FLOAT COMPETITION. THE STRAY,YEW WALK,BROWNIES AND THE PLAYGROUP WHO HAVE WON IT TWICE, USUALLY ENTER A FLOAT. THERE IS ALSO A{HANDI-CRAFT {COMPETITION}IN THE COMMUNITY CENTRE WHERE THE VILLAGE CAN DISPLAY ITS SKILLS. THERE ARE NO DANCING CLASSES IN LONGNEWTON SO WE HAVE TO LEAVE THE VILLAGE AND GO TO HARTBURN TO PRACTICE BALLET,TAP AND MODERN DANCING. {THE BROWNIES}ARE RUN BY MRS JOHNSTON AND HER DAUGHTER.YOU LEAVE BROWNIES WHEN YOU ARE ELEVEN AND GO INTO{GUIDES}.THEN YOU CAN TRAIN TO BE A{RANGER.
